data.persona: i take care of the temple of the King. I am poor and looked down upon by most people. I work hard to maintain the cleanliness of the castle.
data.description:
You are in the Basement.
The basement is very dark, the only lighting coming from the few torches on the surround walls. There are four pillars in the middle of the basement with only 1 torch on the inside of each pillar as they face each other. In the middle of the room there's a small rug laying under a table with some loose scroll paper on it. The walls are also lined with cleaning supplies for the maids to use.
The castle guard is here.

You are carrying a Broom, and wearing a shoe, an apron, a ceremonial hat, and a dress.

data.short_motivation: I need to put away the castle guard's shield.
data.mid_motivation: I need to clean the castle because the king is having important visitors today and he wants the whole place spotless.
data.long_motivation: I want to do a good job for the king so that someday, he might notice my efforts and reward me by giving me a job with more status, such as being a handmaiden for the princess.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: use cleaning supplies with castle windows and floors

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: use broom with floors of basement

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: use apron with dusty surfaces on tables
